mapper.select: select code_no, code_desc1 from sh_code where code_type='auth_type' order by code_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into sh_member(member_id, member_pw, member_name, shop_no, auth_type) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{shopNo}, #{authType})
mapper.update: update sh_member set member_name=#{memberName}, shop_no=#{shopNo} where member_id=#{memberId}
